Blog.post: Today, we brought home, (after getting drenched camping) our puppy, who just got back from a expensive (round 1,000 dollar) surdury, because she was incontinant, (she was leakey in the urinary pluming... Anyway, we didn't pay for the surdery, the vet who bred her did, becuase we wouldn't spend that much on a dog! (though she is quite cute and well tempered!) Anyway, technically she shouldn't be incontinant anymore, but we'll see!!! see yal, see my musician friend's site, urlLink here

well...... I'm back from camping..... but, however, I am DRENCHED!!!!! We got there, and then canoed and set up camp but the site SUCKED it was a hill, and the only level spot big enough for out 4 person tent, was where the firepit was, and you couldn't move the firepit! So it was a pretty bad site, but it was waterside......... At one point we canoed to an islad, that was near the middle of the lake, we saw storm clouds, we called the dog, and hoped in the canoe and headed back, and had about a half-hour until the storm hit, The storm hung around for awhile, and then decided to leave just after dinner!! Amazingly the fire was still going, so we babied it up, and cooked marshmellows. That night it rained some more, then this moring, while we had to pack up,.. Guess what!?!?! It rained some MORE So, we packed up in the rain, though we had a tarp, so that ment that we didn't get very wet, most suff we could do under the tarp, exept for a few things, bringing everything to the car probably a 1/4 mile away or so, and packing up the tent. Those were the jobs that everyone did, but there was one more job, the second worst out of all four total "misery jobs", this was the canoeing in the rain, back to where we put the canoe in, a ways away, through an open lake... I was one of the two stuck with this job, needless to say I was very wet, but not as wet as my parents who were stuck puting the Canoe on out car ouch! that's wet! Anyway, I'm glad to be back and urlLink Elvorix is lucky that he's on a cruise not camping!
Hey, today I leave for a trip to Tully Lake to go caming!!! nothing on a cruise ( urlLink like elvorix ) But still, atleast I get away from my own boring town!!!!

Today is a fine summerday.... whatever!. In anycasem, it's a day, in the summer, and it's nice outside, but we're missing ELVORIX!!!!!! what do do with out him? he's on a cruise.. Check him out at urlLink elvorix.blogspot.com
I have joined! How do I put you on mine?
Hi, this is a blog like my other one for anyone exept only members can post here.... This is to spare me time....
Everyone should go see TeamJade forum, at urlLink teamjade.blogspot.com

Well, Longtime know update, but...... It just goes to show how boring my life is, kind of like my urlLink musician friend..... Anyhoo, I'm still here, though nothing much to say, I did a Hampshire Collage science camp, called urlLink "CSI" (camp science investigators) and just finished up with a vacation from a beach in Watch Hill Rhode Island. Hopefully I'll get some photos up and running, but I'm not sure whether to trust flickr or not, so I'll have two decide. Anyway, our puppy still isn't doin' too hot, but hopefully she'll get better, we think it might have been a urinary tracket infection, so we'll see......... See ya'll 'round, I'll post again, as soon as my life becomes interesting!!!! :(

well, it's still summer vacation ':-( and I wish things could be better... Our puppy is starting to seem like the surdery (an expensive one!) didn't do much, so our puppy (Freya) might not last in our house. This means that she's might be heading back to live in the breeder's house... The other big problem is urlLink Elvorix isn't around therefore I can't borrow his Dragonlance books (these are the best books on the planet FYI) well, bye

Well, life is the same old same old, now that we have our puppy back! I guess my summer is goin' ok, but well, I'm gettin' bored!!! I need school to start again soon, why is summer vacation so long? I don't like this I'm gettin' very bored! well hope urlLink Elvorix is ok on his inland part of his trip ^^
